name: Mr. Fuji

effect.text: Choose a Pok√©mon on your Bench. Shuffle it and any cards attached to it into your deck.

strengths: Saves damaged Pokemon from being knocked out
Shuffles attached energy back into deck
weaknesses: Must redraw and replay the Pokemon
counters: Gust of Wind to force Pokemon active before Mr. Fuji

competitiveHistory: Mr. Fuji was a useful utility Trainer for saving damaged Pokemon and denying prizes. Unlike Scoop Up (which returns to hand), Mr. Fuji shuffles into the deck, making the Pokemon harder to replay but preserving all attached cards. It saw play in control and stall decks.

rulings.ruling: Mr. Fuji can only target a Pokemon on your Bench, not your Active Pokemon.
All cards attached to the Pokemon (Energy, Tools, etc.) are shuffled into the deck along with it.
You cannot use Mr. Fuji if you have no Pokemon on your Bench.
